name: JavaScript For Beginners
title: Full Stack Web Development (JavaScript)
details: Modern websites and applications are usually dynamic. In other words, users interact with them in various ways. Those interactions are then controlled by a system that also collects and stores important data. Web developers use different technologies to support the entire process. In this course you will mainly focus on JavaScript-based technologies.Modern websites and applications are usually dynamic. In other words, users interact with them in various ways. Those interactions are then controlled by a system that also collects and stores important data. Web developers use different technologies to support the entire process. In this course you will mainly focus on JavaScript-based technologies.

name: Professional graphic design
title: Professional graphic design
details: Being a successful graphic designer requires quality curriculum training as well as project-based work experience and a good understanding of the marketplace. So all these are included together in our course module. From the graphic design course you will learn to design any advertisement, banner, t-shirt design, product using Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator. Moreover, you get the opportunity to use modern lab for project based work.

name: UX/UI Design
title: UX/UI Design
details: Where an app or site can have what options are designed through UX/UI Design. Demand for UX/UI designers has also increased hundreds of times for smart work and good salary.So our course will cover you with basic sketching. Learn how to create a flowchart for designing a website, app or banner here. You will learn the use of trendy software Adobe XD and Figma for UX/UI from this course.

name: Full Stack Web Development (MERN)
title: Full Stack Web Development (MERN)
details: To become a full-stack web developer, you need to know the front-end and back-end of a website or web application very well. So throughout the program you will get to learn both types of development in a few steps.Web Development BasicsKnowing HTML and CSS at the most basic level is very useful for any kind of web development. Knowing a framework like Boostrap gives an added advantage. If you do not know about them, you will learn in this course..

name: The compelete Backend Node.js course in 2022
title: The compelete Backend Node.js course in 2022
details: The API reference documentation provides detailed information about a function or object in Node.js. This documentation indicates what arguments a method accepts, the return value of that method, and what errors may be related to that method. It also indicates which methods are available for different versions of Node.js.This documentation describes the built-in modules provided by Node.js. It does not document modules provided by the community.

name: Introdution to React Js For bengenners
title: Introdution to React Js For bengenners with project
details: React makes it painless to create interactive UIs.We’ll assume that you have some familiarity with HTML and JavaScript, but you should be able to follow along even if you’re coming from a different programming language.  Design simple views for each state in your application, and React will efficiently update and render just the right components when your data changes.Declarative views make your code more predictable and easier to debug.
